scene_description_enriched: The image depicts Christ, identifiable by his halo and beard, dressed in a blue tunic and a red mantle. He holds a globe surmounted by a cross in his left hand, symbolizing his dominion over the world. His right hand is raised, possibly in blessing or teaching. The background features a stylized architectural element resembling a latticed window or screen, rendered in dark blue and black lines, suggesting an indoor setting. The overall impression is one of divine authority and cosmic rule.
